• JSON
  • XML
  • YAML

Request

POST /group/
Content-Type: application/json
{
    "name": "My new group", 
    "permissions": [
        "core_access", 
        "contacts_access", 
        "invoicing_access", 
        "organizer_access", 
        "see_invoicebase", 
        "add_invoicebase", 
        "change_invoicebase", 
        "delete_invoicebase", 
        "see_item", 
        "add_item", 
        "change_item", 
        "delete_item", 
        "see_vosaefile", 
        "add_vosaefile", 
        "delete_vosaefile", 
        "see_contact", 
        "add_contact", 
        "change_contact", 
        "delete_contact"
    ]
}

Response

        "delete_item",

Content-Type: application/xml

    <value>delete_contact</value>
  </permissions>
</object>
